page.title: 18Family Expenses
page.content:
It was Saturday,my dad said we were going to Mansfield shopping.We parked for two hours,it cost 40p.Then we did our main week's shopping at Beauty Care and at Tesco's,a large shopping centre,the cost was Â£21.52. We had dinner of chips,peas and steak.Then we went to the swimming baths,that cost 30p. each.We decided to spend two hours there,then went to the tuck shop and went home.
{TRAGEDY STRIKES That night on television we were told about a fire at{Bradford}football stadium.They said it happened so suddenly that many people did not escape.
Fifty six people died in that fire.
